wikipedia_page.main: Zoe Robinson is a British boccia player who won a gold medal in the Team BC1–2 event at the 2008 Summer Paralympics in Beijing, China. She went on to win a bronze in the same event at the 2012 Summer Paralympics in London, UK.

response: The third edition of the International Boccia Championships Pecanins Roser took place in 2013, with a team representing the Catalan region of Spain, a team representing the rest of Spain and a team representing Great Britain. He competed on the rest of Spain team.  The event was a warm up for the European Championships.  Martin won the BC2 individual event against Zoe Robinson of Great Britain by a score of 11–4 and against Benito Sánchez of Catalonia.  The pair of victories qualified him for the final where he played against Spain national team teammate Pedro Cordero Martin whom he be 3-2 He was a member of Spain's delegation at the European Championships contested in June 2013 in Guimaraes, Portugal. In October 2013, he was ranked the Spain's best competitor in his classification.  His team, which includes Vicente Lletí, Raul Martí and Sabrina Balen, was ranked number one.
